questions.question: What era of Texas history would the Empresarios be in?
The year 1821 was an important date in Texas history because it marked?

choices.answer: The beginning of the war for Texas independence
The year Mexico became its own country
When Spain established their first mission and presidio
When the Spanish mapped the Gulf Coast

questions.question: Texas colonists created the Turtle Bayou Resolutions to______?

choices.answer: A decrease in immigration allowed by the U.S
Defend their rights under the Constitution of 1824 and support Santa Anna
Abolish slavery in all of Mexico

questions.question: The Law of April 6, 1830, was added by Mexico in an attempt to?

choices.answer: Reduce American influence in the Texas colonies
Give more freedoms to the Texas colonists
Weaken the control of Tejas y Coahuila state government
Remove all Texan colonists from the settlement in San Antonio

questions.question: The Fredonian Rebellion was an important event in Texas history because?

choices.answer: it was a dispute over loyalty to Mexico or U.S
it was a dispute over indian territory between Mx and U.S
a dispute between an empresario and Mx gov. over land grants
It led to Santa Anna becoming the President of Mexico

questions.question: I was elected President of Mexico, and later declared myself a dictator of Mexico?
According to the Law of April 6, 1830, you would support which type of Mexican government?
I was arrested for treason after a meeting with government officials in Mexico City in 1833?
The writers of the Turtle Bayou Resolutions viewed this man as a talented and distinguished leader?
____delegates at the conventions of 1832 and 1833 decided that immigration from the U.S. be allowed again
The colonists declared loyalty to the Mexico?
The Fredonian Rebellion was important because it was the first dispute between an _ empresario and _ government
The Law of April 6, 1830 implemented what?

choices.answer: prohibit immigration from settlers east of the Mississippi river.

questions.question: what was the event that happened right after the Mier y Teran Report?

choices.answer: The implementation of the Colonization Laws of 1825
The implementation of the Law of April 6, 1830
The writing of the Mexican Federal Constitution of 1824
The election of Antonio Lopez de Santa Anna, as President of Mexico

questions.question: who was sent on a mission to Texas by the Mexican government wrote a REPORT to the Mexican government

choices.answer: Martin De Leon and Green De Witt’s border dispute
Manuel Meir y Teran and the Law of April 6, 1830
Antonio Lopez de Santa Anna and the Turtle Bayou Resolutions
Miguel Hidalgo and the Grito de Dolores
